abstract: Monster Worldwide said Wednesday afternoon that it was buying HotJobs, a rival employment Web site, from Yahoo for $225 million in cash.
snippet: Monster Worldwide said Wednesday afternoon that it was buying HotJobs, a rival employment Web site, from Yahoo for $225 million in cash.
lead_paragraph: Monster Worldwide said Wednesday afternoon that it was buying HotJobs, a rival employment Web site, from Yahoo for $225 million in cash. The deal’s price represents a significant discount from the $439 million that Yahoo paid for HotJobs in 2002.

headline.main: Monster Is Buying HotJobs From Yahoo
